name: 3d Monster Maze (TRS-80 Color Computer)
description: An adaptation of the ZX81 game, 3d Monster Maze, for the TRS-80 color computer.  The goal is to find the exit to a procedurally generated maze while being hunted by a t-rex.  Unlike this original, this version includes an overhead map mode...though if you rely on it too much, the t-rex will catch you.  This game was released as a cartridge. and if you are interested in a physical copy, please contact me.  Below you can purchase a download containing a  .bin and a .dsk file so you can play the game in an emulator or on real hardware using a CoCo SDC. The download also includes the game's source code.
